title: "I enjoy the game as it is now and it shouldn't change only because other people don't"
body: Okay, good for you if you like the present game state, but a lot of people don't and they are all waiting for some major changes to bring back the game they once loved. If a single and small portion of the community wants to keep the game as it is, its not a valid reason for ignoring another (rather big) part of the community who dosen't.

replies.body: It's nice to know I'm not the only one that thinks this.
I don't know of anyone that wants the game to stay exactly the way it is now. Where do you see those people?
